sub_title: Project/Program & Delivery Management Expert (Digital, SAP, Cloud, Agile ) || Agile Expert (Certified SAFe® Agilist (SA), PSM II®,PAL®, PSM I®, SCAC®)
summary:
	 Based in Netherlands since 5+ years with 16 years of industry experience with 10+ years of experience in and as Digital Project and Delivery manager, Agile Coach and Agile Transformation Expert  with expertise in handling large teams, fixed price and T&M based Teams and projects delivery, managing projects delivery from initiation till closure including reporting on triple constraints( Budget, Scope and Schedule ) to stakeholders up-to Senior IT Directors.

	Have experience managing Agile and Digital IT Initiatives Delivery by creating roadmap and its implementation. Managed delivery of initiatives in Agile like Cloud Transformation (MS Azure and O365), Lotus Notes Transformation, ESB (Application Integration) Transformation, Bi-Modal IT Implementation and process optimization, Application Development Portfolio’s Program Increment planning and their delivery.

    Experienced and certified Agile & DevOps Transformation coach, consultant and strategist for large enterprise with working experience as Senior Scrum Master and Agile Coach with certification in 'Professional Agile Leadership', ‘Professional Scrum Master-II’ , ‘Professional Scrum Master-I’, ‘Scrum Coach Accredited Certified’, ‘SAFe Agilist’ with 8+ years into handling multiple agile teams, providing guidance to these teams, their appraisal, and their stakeholders including Product Owners and Chief Product Owners on Agile Principles and Practices like Scrum, Kanban, Scaled Agile and ‘Scrum of Scrums’ and promoting them towards self-organization and agile maturity, removing bottlenecks thereby realizing value/solutions by identifying value streams in alignment with business Product Owners and important stakeholders. 

	Strong Project & Delivery Management skills based on Agile, PMP and Prince2 based methodologies.

	Have hands on work experience in SAP implementation and rollout projects for Global clients like Hewlett Packard, SAP AG, Saudi Aramco, SIPCHEM, Juniper Networks and Thomson Reuters-UK.

	Extensive customer facing experience across multiple geographies such as USA, UK, EMEA and APAC.

	Working experience in Onsite/Offshore model with cost reduction.

	Good overseas (onsite) experience of around 7+ years, working at client site and managing client relationship along with delivery of multiyear multimillion-dollar projects.

	Good domain knowledge of O&G, Metals and Technology, Media and Information Services, Semiconductors and Networking sector

	Experience of Human Resource module and processes in SAP and basic understanding of SAP MM, SD and FI module.

profile_positions.description:
Managing corporate projects to achieve project objectives on time and within budget, including coordinating project initiation, justification, planning, execution and post-implementation assessment. 

 Supporting project sponsors and other key stakeholders concerning project scoping and objective setting, including business case generation (technical, financial and organizational feasibility)

Managing and performing detailed project planning activities, including human resource requirements, project budgeting, project execution and activity scheduling

Coordinating with internal and external project resources including solution vendors and advisors with respect to project execution activities according to project plan
profile_positions.title: Senior Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Handled multiple scrum agile Teams for a flagship Digital Product Delivery, taking care of their agile feature based planning, execution , monitoring and delivery. Working with teams to identify, report and solve the impediments(Risk & Issues). Working to streamline their Agile Processes and their delivery by helping the team to understand and practise agile better. Working with Senior Management in Program/Department level change management and process improvement. Coaching, Mentoring and motivating agile teams and stakeholders towards high value product delivery. Taking care of the release planning with respective stakeholders for an effective and smooth product increment quarterly release.
profile_positions.title: Senior Agile Transformer

profile_positions.description:
Managed and executed IT Digital Transformation related Projects Delivery using Agile and Waterfall methodoligies in SAP, applications/landscape Rationalization and Modernization, Cloud Adoption, and have managed multi million budget offering measurable benefits to customer. Responsibilities included Project Planning, Initaion, Execution, Risk management, Controlling and Monitoring on triple constraint (Scope, Time and Budget) and Project Closure. Handled and reported the project delivery status to key customer stakeholders up-to Senior IT Directors. 
Handled and managed Agile delivery initiatives like Cloud Transformation (MS Azure and O365), Lotus Notes Transformation, ESB (Application Integration) Transformation, Bi-Modal (Agile) IT Implementation and process optimization, Application Development Portfolio’s Program Increment planning and their delivery. Conducted all the Agile cermonies for my project team and guided other teams on their Agile Journey with other Agile Coaches and their Scrum Masters.
